text: Bestseller Tower is a planned high-rise building in Brande, a rural town in Denmark. The proposed skyscraper would house the headquarters of fashion company Bestseller and was announced in 2017 with a design by Dorte Mandrup. The building is scheduled to be completed in 2023 and would become the tallest building in Western Europe. Ramboll have been chosen as the consulting engineers. ==References== Category:Skyscrapers in Denmark
title: Bestseller Tower
